Description: Verify left sidebar is visible and displays all menu items
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /dashboard
2. Check left sidebar
Expected Result: Sidebar shows all menu items (Dashboard, Products, Code Library, Quality Measures, Value Sets, Code Mappings, Analytics, Settings, Support, Users)
Acceptance Criteria: Sidebar is visible and contains all navigation items

Description: Verify Dashboard menu item is highlighted when on dashboard page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /dashboard
2. Check sidebar active state
Acceptance Criteria: Active state clearly indicates current page

3. Wait for results
Expected Result: Filters to show codes with 'hemoglobin' in description
